message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.SE. 

The paper presents a reinforcement learning algorithm that allows for the asking of questions to neural network policies, which can be used to improve the policy's performance and robustness. This topic is closely related to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI), as well as robotics (cs.RO) and systems and control (cs.SY) since the algorithm can be used to shape policies for control systems. Additionally, the algorithm can be used to improve the safety of policies, which is relevant to software engineering (cs.SE).
